languages.text: "Ты притащил на трибунал {mf|этого мальчишку|эту девчонку} и надеешься, что кто-то станет слушать свидетельства ничтожно{mf|го|й} ерети{mf|ка|чки}? Я была о тебе лучшего мнения, дознаватель ван Калокс. Увы, напрасно". {n}Голос Леди Теодоры звучит еще жестче и острее, чем вы помните.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Леди Теодора еле сдерживается, чтобы не рассмеяться на весь мостик.{/n} "Ты притащил на трибунал {mf|этого мальчишку|эту девчонку} и надеешься, что кто-то станет слушать свидетельства ничтожно{mf|го|й} ерети{mf|ка|чки}? Я была о тебе лучшего мнения, дознаватель ван Калокс. Увы, напрасно".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты притащил на трибунал {mf|этого мальчишку|эту девчонку} и надеешься, что кто-то станет слушать свидетельства ничтожно{mf|го|й} ерети{mf|ка|чки}? Я была о тебе лучшего мнения, дознаватель ван Калокс. Увы, напрасно". {n}Голос Леди Теодоры звучит еще жестче и острее, чем вы помните.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} to the trial and expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I used to think better of you, interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

traits.locale_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} to the trial and expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I used to think better of you, interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} to the trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I used to think better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

traits.locale_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: « Vous faites comparaître {mf|ce garçon|cette fille} au tribunal et vous espérez sincèrement que quelqu'un prête l'oreille au témoignage d'{mf|un|une} vulgaire hérétique ? J'avais une meilleure opinion de vous, interrogateur van Calox. À l'évidence, j'ai eu tort. » {n}La voix de dame Théodora est encore plus dure et agressive que dans vos souvenirs.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous faites comparaître {mf|ce garçon|cette fille} au tribunal et espérez sincèrement que quelqu'un prête l'oreille au témoignage d'{mf|un|une} vulgaire hérétique ? J'avais une meilleure opinion de vous, interrogateur van Calox. À l'évidence, j'ai eu tort. » {n}La voix de dame Théodora est encore plus dure et agressive que dans vos souvenirs.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: “{mf|他|她}不过是个卑微的异端分子罢了。你把{mf|他|她}拖来受审，现在居然还要其他人聆听这个异端之人的证词？我原本对你的评价不低，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官，但现在看来，是我大错特错。”{n}西奥多拉夫人的声音，听起来比你记忆中的声音更加刺耳、更加愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “{mf|他|她}不过是个卑微的异端分子罢了。你把{mf|他|她}拖来受审，现在居然还要其他人聆听这个异端之人的证词？我原本对你的评价不低，冯·卡洛克斯审讯官，但现在看来，是我大错特错。”{n}西奥多拉夫人的声音，听起来比你记忆中的声音更加刺耳、更加愤怒。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: 「この{mf|坊や|嬢ちゃん}を裁判に引きずり出しておいて、いまさら下等な異端者の証言に耳を貸す者がいるとでも思うのか？インテロゲイターヴァン・カロックス。お前のことは買っていたのだが、大間違いだったな」{n}シオドーラ卿の声は、あなたが覚えているよりもさらに厳しく、怒りに満ちているように聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この{mf|坊や|嬢ちゃん}を裁判に引きずり出しておいて、いまさら下等な異端者の証言に耳を貸す者がいるとでも思うのか？インテロゲイターヴァン・カロックス。お前のことは買っていたのだが、大間違いだったな」{n}シオドーラ卿の声は、あなたが覚えているよりもさらに厳しく、怒りに満ちているように聞こえる。{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Ihr habt {mf|diesen Jungen|dieses Mädchen} zum Prozess gezerrt und erwartet jetzt wirklich, dass jemand der Aussage {mf|eines niederen Ketzers|einer niederen Ketzerin} Gehör schenkt? Ich hatte mehr von Euch erwartet, Interrogator van Calox. Offensichtlich habe ich mich geirrt." {n}Lady Theodoras Stimme klingt wesentlich barscher und zorniger als in deiner Erinnerung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt {mf|diesen Jungen|dieses Mädchen} zum Prozess gezerrt und erwartet jetzt wirklich, dass sich jemand der Aussage {mf|eines niederen Ketzers|einer niederen Ketzerin} Gehört schenkt? Eigentlich hatte ich mehr von Euch erwartet, Interrogator van Calox. Offensichtlich habe ich mich geirrt." {n}Lady Theodoras Stimme klingt wesentlich barscher und zorniger als in deiner Erinnerung.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: «¿Arrastras a {mf|este muchacho|esta muchacha} a un juicio y ahora esperas que alguien preste atención al testimonio de un vulgar hereje? Pensaba que eras más competente, interrogador Van Calox. Pero veo que me equivocaba». {n}La voz de lady Theodora suena aún más severa e iracunda de lo que recordabas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Arrastras a {mf|este muchacho|esta muchacha} a un juicio y ahora esperas que alguien preste atención al testimonio de un vulgar hereje? Te tenía en cierta estima, interrogador Van Calox. Pero veo que me equivocaba». {n}La voz de lady Theodora suena aún más severa e iracunda de lo que recordabas.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora

languages.text: "Bu {mf|çocukcağızı|kızcağızı} bu davaya çekmişsiniz, şimdi de insanların aşağılık bir kâfirin ifadesine kulak vermesini mi bekliyorsunuz? Sizden bunu beklemezdim Sorgucu van Calox. Çok yanılmışım." {n}Leydi Theodora'nın sesi hatırladığından da daha sert ve öfkeli çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You dragged this {mf|boy|girl} into this trial and now expect someone will lend an ear to a lowly heretic's testimony? I thought better of you, Interrogator van Calox. I was so very wrong." {n}Lady Theodora's voice sounds even harsher and angrier than you remember.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu {mf|çocukcağızı|kızcağızı} bu davaya çekmişsiniz ve şimdi de insanların aşağılık bir kâfirin ifadesine kulak vermesini mi bekliyorsunuz? Sizden bunu beklemezdim Sorgucu van Calox. Çok yanılmışım." {n}Leydi Theodora'nın sesi hatırladığından da daha sert ve öfkeli.{/n}
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Dream_Iremerris+Theodora
